title: EM waves - acceleration direction of electron

content.prompt: An electron is initially at rest, far away from other charged objects. An electromagnetic wave approaches the electron, traveling in the positive z-direction. choices.label: Parallel to the x-axis. Electromagnetic waves are transverse waves.

Parallel to the z-axis. Electromagnetic waves are transverse waves.
Parallel to the z-axis. Electromagnetic waves are longitudinal waves.
